i saw a mod that let you set up an automated setting for the stages triggers, and being an old idiot, i cant remember what it was. probably mechjeb does it, but i aren't into my career far enough yet for that module, but it was some other mod i saw that did this.

i am so sick of keep hitting the space-bar by accident and sending my little green guy off into a never ending orbit to die a slow death...and my wife thinks i do it deliberately...damn i really need that clever mod...anyone any help please

many thanks

sam

bless you blizzy78, your a gent.

just downloaded your ingame tutorials and about to start the moon travel one, thank you so much for all your really wonderful work, all you modding people are clever and brilliant.
Please be advised that I have not updated all those plugins yet for newer KSP versions. The tutorials *should* work, but you *might* get errors.

KSP alternate Resource panel has the same feature, but you have to enable it since it isn't by default.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60227-0-23-5-KSP-Alternate-Resource-Panel-v2-2-0-0-%28April-19%29
